main event: A single bright object was observed by persons participating in Sounding Rocket R&D program at Edwards AFB, California, for 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was seen trailing a jet during the first few minutes,There were multiple witnesses involved in the observation,The object was noted to hover and then change shape during the sighting,There was a follow-up investigation conducted by the Air Force regarding the incident,Initial conclusions suggested the object may have been a released balloon from Edwards AFB.
witness description: Participants in the Sounding Rocket R&D program
